catalog_info.title: Foundational Fiction and Film
catalog_info.notes: Conducted in Spanish. Conducted in Spanish.
catalog_info.description: Through novels that helped to consolidate nation-states in Latin America, explores modernity as personal and public lessons in laissez-faire. Sequels in film, telenovelas, performances show tenacity of genre. Links between creativity and citizenship. Theorists include Anderson, Foucault, Arendt, Lukacs, Flaubert.
